anya-e0805n4:2_0: Atha nāmato eva vibhatyantā apaccādiatthavisese taddhituppattīti nāmato paraṁ taddhitavidhānamārabhīyate.
anya-e0805n4:3_0: Tattha tasmā tividhaliṅgato paraṁ hutvā hitā sahitāti taddhitā,
anya-e0805n4:3_2: tesaṁ vā nāmikānaṁ hitā upakārā taddhitāti anvatthabhūtaparasamaññāvasenāpi ṇādippaccayāva taddhitā nāma.
anya-e0805n4:7_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato liṅgamhā ṇappaccayo hoti vikappena ‘‘tassa apacca’’miccetasmiṁ atthe.
anya-e0805n4:10_1: liṅgehi ca paccayā parāva hontīti paribhāsato apaccatthasambandhiliṅgato chaṭṭhiyantāyeva paro hoti.
anya-e0805n4:14_0: Ādisarassa vā ādibyañjanassa vā asaṁyogantassa vuddhi hoti saṇakārappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n4:14_4: tadā ca pakatibhūte liṅge sarānamādisarassa asaṁyogantassa vuddhi hoti saṇakāre taddhitappaccaye pareti attho.
anya-e0805n4:21_0: Tesaṁ akāraivaṇṇuvaṇṇānameva yathākkamaṁ ā eoiccete vuddhiyo honti.
anya-e0805n4:21_6: Ā ca e ca o ca āyo.
anya-e0805n4:22_0: Yathā hi katavuddhīnaṁ, puna vuddhi na hotiha;
anya-e0805n4:23_0: Tathā sabhāvavuddhīnaṁ, āyonaṁ puna vuddhi na.
anya-e0805n4:24_2: ‘‘naye paraṁ yutte’’ti paranayanaṁ katvā taddhitattā ‘‘taddhitasamāsa’’iccādinā nāmabyapadese kate pure viya syādyuppatti.
anya-e0805n4:25_4: Evaṁ sabbattha gottataddhite paṭhamappakatitoyeva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n4:26_0: Itthiyaṁ ṇappaccayantattā ‘‘ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇa ntūhī’’ti vāsiṭṭhasaddato īpaccayo.
anya-e0805n4:26_1: Saralopādiṁ katvā itthippaccayantattā ‘‘taddhitasamāsa’’iccādisutte caggahaṇena nāmabyapadese kate syādyuppatti,
anya-e0805n4:28_3: Ettha ca ayuvaṇṇattābhāvā ākārādīnaṁ na vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0805n4:29_0: ‘‘Vacchassa apacca’’nti viggahe ṇamhi sampatte ‘‘vā ṇa’pacce’’ti ito vāti taddhitavidhāne sabbattha vattate,
anya-e0805n4:31_0: Vaccha kaccaiccevamādito chaṭṭhiyantato gottagaṇato ṇāyana ṇānaiccate paccayā honti vā ‘‘tassāpacca’’miccetasmiṁ atthe.
anya-e0805n4:35_1: Kattikā vinatārohiṇīiccevamādīhi itthiyaṁ vattamānehi liṅgehi ṇeyyappaccayo hoti vā ‘‘tassāpacca’’miccetasmiṁ atthe.
anya-e0805n4:39_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā ṇipaccayo hoti vā ‘‘tassāpacca’’miccetasmiṁ atthe. Dakkhi, dakkhī, dakkhayo,
anya-e0805n4:43_2: ‘‘yavataṁ talanadakārānaṁ byañjanāni ca la ña jakāratta’’nti tyakārasaṁyogassa cakāro,
anya-e0805n4:47_0: Tesu ādimajjhuttaresu avihitalakkhaṇesu jinavacanānuparodhena kvaci vuddhi lopa āgama vikāra viparītaādesā hontīti saṁyogantattepi ādivuddhi,
anya-e0805n4:50_0: Upagu manuiccevamādīhi ukārantehi gottagaṇehi ṇavappaccayo hoti vā ‘‘tassāpacca’’miccetasmiṁ atthe.
anya-e0805n4:50_1: Ādisaddassa cettha pakāravācakattā ukārantatoyevāyaṁ. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṁ,
anya-e0805n4:57_0: 373.Yena vā saṁsaṭṭhaṁ tarati carati vahati ṇiko.
anya-e0805n4:58_4: tato tatiyantato liṅgamhā tesu saṁsaṭṭhādīsvatthesu ṇikappaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n4:64_6: tamassa jīvikā iccetesvatthesu ca dutiyādivibhatyantehi liṅgehi ṇikappaccayo hoti vā. Venayiko.
anya-e0805n4:68_0: I uiccebhesaṁ ādisarānaṁ asaṁyogantānaṁ mā vuddhi hoti saṇe,
anya-e0805n4:68_1: tatreva vuddhi āgamo hoti ca ṭhāneti ekāravuddhāgamo.
anya-e0805n4:72_8: ettha ca ‘‘sasare vāgamo’’ti sutte vavatthitavāsaddena paccaye parepi sāgamo,
anya-e0805n4:73_0: Sannidhānatthe sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā, sārīrikaṁ dukkhaṁ. Evaṁ mānasikā, mānasikaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:75_0: Sippatthe vīṇāvādanaṁ vīṇā, vīṇā assa sippaṁ veṇiko. Evaṁ pāṇaviko, modiṅgiko, vaṁsiko.
anya-e0805n4:76_0: Bhaṇḍatthe gandho assa bhaṇḍanti gandhiko. Evaṁ teliko, goḷiko, pūviko, paṇṇiko, tambūliko, loṇiko.
anya-e0805n4:78_18: tadassa payojananti evamādiatthe ca ṇikappaccayo hoti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n4:80_0: Vāto assa ābādhoti vātiko. Evaṁ semhiko, pittiko.
anya-e0805n4:86_0: Sambhūtatthe mātito sambhūtaṁ mattikaṁ. Evaṁ pettikaṁ. Upadhitassa payojanaṁ opadhikaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:90_1: ‘‘tasse’’ti chaṭṭhiyantato ‘‘ida’’miccetasmiṁ atthe ca aññatthesu ca ṇappaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n4:93_0: ‘‘Isissa ida’’nti atthe ṇappaccaye kate vuddhimhi sampatte –
anya-e0805n4:96_0: I uiccetesaṁ ādisarānaṁ āttañca hoti saṇakārappaccaye pare,
anya-e0805n4:96_1: casaddena rikārāgamo ca ṭhāneti ikārassa āttaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:99_0: Ārisyaṁ, usabhassa idaṁ āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ, āsabhī vācā.
anya-e0805n4:100_14: tamassa parimāṇanti iccevamādīsvatthesu ca ṇappaccayo. Yathā –
anya-e0805n4:101_0: Bhavatthe manasi bhavaṁ mānasaṁ sukhaṁ, sāgamo.
anya-e0805n4:102_13: ‘‘Sabbato ko’’ti ettha puna sabbatoggahaṇena taddhitatopi kvaci sasarakakārāgamo,
anya-e0805n4:103_0: Janapadanāmesu pana sabbattha bahuvacanameva bhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n4:103_12: sindhavako vā, assako, kāliṅgo, pañcālo, sakko,
anya-e0805n4:104_0: Nakkhattayoge kattikāya puṇṇacandayuttāya yutto māso kattiko,
anya-e0805n4:104_1: magasirena candayuttena nakkhattena yutto māso māgasiro.
anya-e0805n4:105_5: udumbarā asmiṁ padese santīti odumbaro deso.
anya-e0805n4:109_0: Jātaiccevamādīnaṁ saddānaṁ atthe ima iyaiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n4:112_6: tasmiṁ vā vijjatīti puttimo, puttiyo, vuttiko,
anya-e0805n4:114_9: ‘‘osare cā’’ti sutte casaddena yappaccaye parepi avādeso.
anya-e0805n4:118_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato ‘‘tesaṁ samūho’’ti atthe kaṇaṇaiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n4:123_10: Casaddena hitādiatthepi upādānānaṁ hitā upādāniyā iccādi.
anya-e0805n4:129_0: ‘‘Abhijjhā assa pakati, abhijjhā assa bahulā’’ti vā viggahe –
anya-e0805n4:131_11: Evaṁ potako, kumārako, māṇavako, muduko, ujuko,
anya-e0805n4:137_0: Manato nipphannā manomayā, ayasāpakataṁ ayomayaṁ. Ettha ca ‘‘manogaṇādīna’’nti vattamāne –
anya-e0805n4:139_0: Etesaṁ manogaṇādīnaṁ anto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kateti okāro.
anya-e0805n4:145_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato ṇyattatāiccete paccayā honti ‘‘tassa bhāvo’’ iccetasmiṁ atthe,
anya-e0805n4:145_5: ‘‘yassa guṇassa hi bhāvā dabbe saddaniveso tadabhidhāneṇyattatādayo’’ti.
anya-e0805n4:148_0: ‘‘Paṇḍitassa bhāvo paṇḍitya’’ntiādīsu ‘‘yavataṁ talanadakārānaṁ byañjanāni calañajakāratta’’nti tyakārasaṁyogādīnaṁ calañajakārādesā , dvittaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:149_4: Tathā ‘‘purisassa bhāvo porisa’’ntiādīsu ‘‘yavataṁ talanā’’disutte kāraggahaṇena yavataṁ sakārakacaṭapavaggānaṁ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesā.
anya-e0805n4:152_0: Ttanapaccaye – puthujjanassa bhāvo puthujjanattanaṁ, vedanattanaṁ, jāyattanaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:159_1: tta tā ca ‘‘tassa bhāvo’’ iccetasmiṁ atthe.
anya-e0805n4:159_7: ‘‘o sare cā’’ti sutte casaddaggahaṇena ukārassa ca avādeso.
anya-e0805n4:160_1: muduno bhāvo maddavaṁ iccatra ‘‘āttañcā’’ti ṇamhi ikārukārānaṁ āttaṁ, dvibhāvo,
anya-e0805n4:165_0: ‘‘Sabbe ime pāpā ayamimesaṁ visesena pāpo’’ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n4:167_0: Visesatthe tara tama isika iya iṭṭhaiccete paccayā honti. Pāpataro, pāpatarā,
anya-e0805n4:167_4: pāpisikaṁ. Pāpiyo, pāpiyā, pāpiyaṁ. Pāpiṭṭho, pāpiṭṭhā,
anya-e0805n4:167_8: Evaṁ paṭutaro, paṭutamo, paṭisiko, paṭiyo, paṭiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n4:167_9: Sabbesaṁ atisayena varo varataro, varatamo, varisiko, variyo, variṭṭho.
anya-e0805n4:168_0: ‘‘Sabbe ime vuḍḍhā ayamimesaṁ visesena vuḍḍho’’ti atthe iyaiṭṭhappaccayā honti.
anya-e0805n4:170_0: Sabbasseva vuḍḍhasaddassa jo hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu. Jeyyo, jeṭṭho,
anya-e0805n4:170_1: ettha ca ‘‘saralopādi’’sutte tuggahaṇena lopamakatvā ‘‘sarā sare lopa’’nti pubbasare lutte ‘‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṁ lutte’’ti ekāro.
anya-e0805n4:173_2: Ayañca pasattho ayañca pasattho sabbe ime pasatthā ayamimesaṁ visesena pasatthoti seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0805n4:175_0: Sabbasseva antikasaddassa nedādeso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena antikoti nediyo, nediṭṭho.
anya-e0805n4:177_0: Sabbasseva bāḷhasaddassa sādhādeso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena bāḷhoti sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n4:179_0: Sabbassa appasaddassa kaṇa hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena appoti kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n4:184_0: Vantumantuvī iccetesaṁ paccayānaṁ lopo hoti iyiṭṭhesu.
anya-e0805n4:184_1: Sabbe ime guṇavanto ayamimesaṁ visesena guṇavāti guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho,
anya-e0805n4:187_0: ‘‘Medhā yassa atthi, tasmiṁ vā vijjatī’’ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n4:189_1: tasmiṁ vā vijjati’’ iccetesvatthesu vīpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n4:190_0: Caggahaṇena so i lava ālādippaccayā ca. Yathā –
anya-e0805n4:191_0: ‘‘Tapo assa atthi, tasmiṁ vā vijjatī’’ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n4:195_0: ‘‘Daṇḍo assa atthi, tasmiṁ vā vijjatī’’ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n4:197_1: daṇḍaiccevamādito avaṇṇantā ika ī iccete paccayā honti ‘‘tadassatthi’’ iccetasmiṁ atthe. Daṇḍiko, daṇḍī, daṇḍino, daṇḍinī.
anya-e0805n4:197_2: Evaṁ māliko, mālī, mālinī, chattiko, chattī, rūpiko, rūpī, kesiko, kesī, saṅghī, ñāṇī,
anya-e0805n4:200_0: ‘‘Guṇo assa atthi, tasmiṁ vā vijjatī’’ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n4:203_0: ‘‘Sati assa atthi, tasmiṁ vā vijjatī’’ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n4:206_0: Satiiccevamādīhi avaṇṇantarahitehi paṭhamāvibhatyantehi liṅgehi mantuppaccayo hoti ‘‘tadassatthī’’ti atthe.
anya-e0805n4:209_0: Āyussa ukāro asa hoti mantumhīti asādeso. Āyasmā,
anya-e0805n4:209_2: Gāvo assa santīti gomā, gomanto, gomatī, gomantī,
anya-e0805n4:217_2: tasmiṁ saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe chaṭṭhiyantato mappaccayo hoti. Pañcamo,
anya-e0805n4:217_8: Evaṁ sattamo, sattamī, sattamā, sattamaṁ, aṭṭhamo, aṭṭhamī, aṭṭhamā, aṭṭhamaṁ, navamo , navamī, navamā, navamaṁ, dasamo, dasamī, dasamā,
anya-e0805n4:220_1: Catunnaṁ pūraṇo catuttho, dvittaṁ, catutthī, catutthā,
anya-e0805n4:220_3: channaṁ pūraṇo chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhī, chaṭṭhā, chaṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0805n4:223_0: Chassa sakārādeso hoti vā saṅkhyāne. Chāhamassa jīvitaṁ sāhaṁ, chāhaṁ vā, saḷāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:226_0: Dvitiiccetehi tiyappaccayo hoti saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe. Vipariṇāmena ‘‘dvi tiṇṇa’’nti vattamāne –
anya-e0805n4:228_2: Evaṁ tiṇṇaṁ pūraṇo tatiyo, tatiyā, tatiyaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:228_5: Dve rattiyo durattaṁ, duvidhaṁ, duvaṅgaṁ, dirattaṁ, diguṇaṁ, digu.
anya-e0805n4:230_0: Tesaṁ catutthadutiyatatiyānaṁ aḍḍhūpapadānaṁ aḍḍhūpapadena saha aḍḍhuḍḍhadivaḍḍhadiyaḍḍhaaḍḍhatiyādesā honti.
anya-e0805n4:234_0: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo divaḍḍho, diyaḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0805n4:235_1: ‘‘ekena adhikā dasā’’ti atthe tappurisasamāse vā kate ‘‘saṅkhyāne’’ti vattamāne ‘‘dvekaṭṭhānamākāro vā’’ti āttaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:245_0: Ekādito parassa dasassa ante īpaccayo hoti vā pūraṇatthe.
anya-e0805n4:248_0: Ekādasannaṁ pūraṇī ekādasī, aññatra ekādasamo, ekādasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:249_0: Dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti ‘‘dvi dasa’’iccatra ‘‘vā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n4:251_2: ‘‘tesu vuddhi lopā’’dinā tissa teādaso ānavutiyā, terasamo, terasī.
anya-e0805n4:252_1: catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra ‘‘gaṇane dasassā’’ti ca vattamāne ‘‘catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cucopi navā’’ti tulopo, cuco ca. Cuddasa, coddasa,
anya-e0805n4:253_2: ‘‘tesu vuddhi lopā’’dinā pañcasaddassa dasa vīsesu pannapaṇṇaādesāpi,
anya-e0805n4:254_1: chahi vā adhikā dasā’’ti samāse kate ‘‘chassā’’ti vattamāne ‘‘dase so niccañcā’’ti so,
anya-e0805n4:255_0: Ḷo niccaṁ soḷase dassa, cattālīse ca terase;
anya-e0805n4:257_0: Laḷānamaviseso kvaci, soḷasa. Teḷasa, cattālīsaṁ, cattārīsaṁ. Soḷasamo, soḷasī.
anya-e0805n4:262_0: Dasa ca dasa cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṁ katvā ‘‘dasadasā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘sarūpānamekasesvasaki’’nti ekasese kate dasasaddato paṭhamābahuvacanaṁ yo.
anya-e0805n4:263_0: 413.Gaṇane dasassa dviti catu pañca cha satta aṭṭhanavakānaṁ vīti cattāra paññā cha sattāsa navā yosu yonañcī samāsaṁ ṭhiri tītuti.
anya-e0805n4:264_0: Gaṇane dasassa sambandhīnaṁ dvika tika catukka pañcaka chakkasattaka aṭṭhaka navakānaṁ katekasesānaṁ
anya-e0805n4:264_1: yathākkamaṁ vīti cattāra paññā cha satta asa nava iccādesā honti yosu paresu,
anya-e0805n4:264_2: yonañca īsaṁ āsaṁ ṭhi riti īti utiiccete ādesā hontīti dvidasatthavācakassa dasassa vīādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n4:267_0: Tāsaṁ saṅkhyānamante tikārāgamo hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n4:271_0: Dasa ca dasa ca dasa cāti ‘‘dasa dasa dasā’’ti vattabbe ekasese kate ‘‘gaṇane dasassā’’tiādinā tiīsamādesā,
anya-e0805n4:275_1: yovacanassa ri, ti ca. Sattari, sattati,
anya-e0805n4:276_1: yovacanassa ītiādeso ca. Asīti, ekāsīti, dveasīti, teasīti,
anya-e0805n4:280_0: Gaṇane pariyāpannassa dasadasakatthavācakassa dasasaddassa sataṁ hoti,
anya-e0805n4:281_0: Satassa dvikanti atthe chaṭṭhītappurisaṁ katvā ‘‘sataṁ dvika’’nti vattabbe ‘‘dvikādīnaṁ taduttarapadānañca
anya-e0805n4:281_1: nipaccante’’ti vuttiyaṁ vacanato iminā nipātanena uttarapadassa pubbanipāto,
anya-e0805n4:281_10: Atha vā dve satāni dvisatanti digusamāso.
anya-e0805n4:286_0: Yāsaṁ pana saṅkhyānaṁ aniddiṭṭhanāmadheyyānaṁ yāni rūpāni,
anya-e0805n4:291_2: Evaṁ tikaṁ, catukkaṁ, pañcakaṁ, chakkaṁ, sattakaṁ, aṭṭhakaṁ, navakaṁ, dasakaṁ,
anya-e0805n4:296_0: Ekadvitiiccevamādito gaṇanato sakissa ṭhāne vāratthe kkhattuṁpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n4:300_3: Dvīhi vibhāgehi dvidhā, dudhā vā, dvedhā.
anya-e0805n4:300_6: Evaṁ catudhā, pañcadhā, chadhā, sattadhā, aṭṭhadhā, navadhā, dasadhā, satadhā,
anya-e0805n4:301_0: Jjhappaccaye ekadhā karotīti ekajjhaṁ. Evaṁ dvejjhaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:302_2: sabbākārena sabbaso , upāyaso, hetuso, ṭhānaso, yoniso.
anya-e0805n4:307_1: ‘‘Kissa ka ve cā’’ti ettha casaddena kissa kādeso. Kathaṁ,
anya-e0805n4:307_7: ‘‘imassi thaṁ dāniha to dhesu cā’’ti imasaddassa ikāro, dvittaṁ.
anya-e0805n4:307_8: Ettha hi kkhattuṁ ādithaṁpariyosānappaccayantānaṁ abyayataddhitattā nāmabyapadesaṁ katvā vibhattimhi kate ‘‘sabbāsamāvuso’’tiādinā vibhattilopo,
anya-e0805n4:307_9: ‘‘kvaci to pañcamyatthe’’tiādinā vuttatoādippaccayantā ca idheva abyayataddhite saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0805n4:309_0: Ye saddā lakkhaṇena anupapannā aniddiṭṭhalakkhaṇā akkharādito,
anya-e0805n4:311_0: Imasmā jja siyā kāle, samānāparato jju ca;
anya-e0805n4:312_0: Imasaddassa’kāro ca, samānassa ca so siyā.
